attributes.action: invest more money into research to discover causes and treatments for ALL congenital conditions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want to see the government investing money in researching the causes of congenital (born with) conditions. Babies are being born every day in the UK who will die at a very young age from conditions for which no cause has yet been found. By discovering the causes of such conditions, many babies lives will be saved each year, and if the conditions are prevented it will save the NHS money!! Don't let the babies die needlessly

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "invest more money into research to discover causes and treatments for ALL congenital conditions."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14137.asp

Prime Minister's Office
